h2_title: How to Unlock Skills in Black Myth: Wukong
content: You can unlock skills under the Self-Advance tab of the main menu. To be able to awaken skills, you'll need Sparks, which are earned through leveling up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock Skills in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
You can unlock skills under the Self-Advance tab of the main menu. To be able to awaken skills, you'll need Sparks, which are earned through leveling up.
